Name: Another Side
About the game: Sara, a lost girl, her vague memories say nothing. How did she get here? Who brought her? And the main thing, how to get out? As this little girl, you will encounter mysterious, silent scenarios with seemingly no one around. Another Side is a psychological horror game with greater focus on the mystery of the plot and atmosphere than just cheap scares on the screen, brings a simple mechanics with greater purpose in its story, explore every corner, use logic and find paths to be followed. Single player campaign. Each chapter has a correct way to advance, find out how. Carry items you need, explore the place, interact with everything Read everything you find to better understand the story Discover an original and different story.
